hero.title: Gar-Type
hero.description: Gar-Type is a free pixel art shooter game developed by Lumpy, inspired by the mysterious Gar character. This sci-fi adventure game combines humor with intense action as players defend Earth from the invasion of the living planet Gar.

videos.gameplayDesc: Watch gameplay footage and see the action firsthand

guide.title: Game Guide
items: Start by selecting your ship configuration
Practice dodging patterns in training mode
Complete tutorial missions to understand core mechanics

combat.title: Combat Tips
items: Keep moving to avoid enemy fire
Use terrain for cover when possible
Time your attacks with enemy patterns

reviews.review1: This game is hilarious! The combination of Garfield and shooter is really creative ðŸ˜‚
reviews.review2: The pixel style is great, it feels like playing an old arcade game, and the BGM is also very exciting!
reviews.review3: The game is a bit difficult, the BOSS battles are super exciting, but sometimes I feel that the teleportation skills are difficult to control.
reviews.review4: Lumpy Touch's work is always so interesting! Hoping for more levels.
reviews.review5: It has the feeling of ã€ŠR-Typeã€‹ and ã€ŠThunderã€‹ to play, nostalgic and novel, recommended to players who like STG!
reviews.review6: Good game, but a little difficult, can you add an easy mode? ðŸ˜‚
reviews.review7: The music reminds me of the old arcade games I used to play when I was a kid. It's amazing!
reviews.review8: The BOSS battle is really challenging, especially the last level, almost did not stick!
reviews.review9: This game is perfect for Garfield fans! The enemy design is full of detail and really funny.
reviews.review10: The pace of the game is very fast, it is a little difficult to get started at first, but after getting used to it, you can't stop!
reviews.review11: Try to challenge speed pass, feel quite likely to break the record, looking forward to the official ranking!
reviews.review12: The game is very interesting, but some parts of the difficulty is a little unreasonable, I hope to optimize it.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Meet the team behind Gar-Type and learn about our mission to create engaging pixel art games.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create engaging pixel art games that combine retro aesthetics with modern gameplay mechanics, delivering unique and memorable gaming experiences.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: We believe in creating games with heart, fostering a positive community, and maintaining transparency with our players.

director.description: Creator of the Gar universe and lead game designer.

artist.name: PixelArtist
artist.description: Responsible for the unique pixel art style and visual effects.

developer.name: CodeMaster
developer.description: The technical wizard behind our game mechanics.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: We believe in the power of community and open source development.

pixelPerfect.title: Pixel Perfect
pixelPerfect.description: Every pixel is crafted with care to create beautiful retro aesthetics.

community.title: Community First
community.description: Our players are at the heart of everything we do.

questions.q2: What platforms does the game support?
questions.q3: Does the game have a multiplayer mode?
questions.q6: Why is the game painting so strange?
questions.q7: What about the sound and music?
questions.q8: Does the game have hidden elements or Easter eggs?

answers.a1: The game is free, requires no installation and can be played directly in the browser (some devices may need to download a native version).
answers.a2: It currently supports Windows and browser (Web version),Mobile (phone/tablet) and console (PS/Xbox/Switch) are not supported.
answers.a3: Currently only single-player mode is supported, with no local or online multiplayer.
answers.a4: The game is challenging, especially in BOSS battles and barrage scenarios, and requires flexibility,However, the game supports random powerups, and proper use can reduce the difficulty.
answers.a5: Yes, you can choose between Easy, Normal, and Hard difficulty modes at the start of your game.
answers.a6: The game uses pixel art style to pay homage to classic arcade shooters, while incorporating humorous and quirky elements,For example: The enemy design is inspired by Garfield and has many fun spoof details.
answers.a7: The background music of the game has a retro arcade style to enhance the immersion,Some of the sound effects and BOSS dubbing have funny elements to make the battle more interesting.
answers.a8: Yes, we do! The game has hidden enemies, funny dialogue and special events that can be played multiple times to try to discover,Some levels may feature tribute elements that parody classic shooters.

privacy.welcome_message: Welcome to Gar-Type (hereinafter referred to as the Game). The game respects users' privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully to understand how we collect, use and protect your information.
privacy.data_collection1: When you use the game, we may collect the following information:
privacy.device_info_item: Include the device model, operating system, and unique device identifier.
privacy.game_data_item: Include game progress, score, leaderboard data, etc.
privacy.user_feedback_item: If you provide feedback via email or forum, we may collect your contact information.
privacy.data_usage1: Information we collect may be used for the following purposes:
privacy.improve_experience_item: Optimize performance, fix bugs, adjust game difficulty.
privacy.analytics_item: Analyze user behavior to improve game content.
privacy.customer_support_item: Respond to your feedback and questions.
privacy.data_sharing1: We do not sell or rent your personal information. Exceptions are:
privacy.legal_compliance_item: We may disclose your information when required by law or requested by law enforcement agencies.
privacy.business_change_item: In the event of a transfer, merger or sale of the game, your information may be transferred.
privacy.third_party_services_item: The game may integrate third party services (e.g. advertising, analytics tools). These services may collect some information about you and their privacy policies apply to their data collection practices.
privacy.data_security_item: We take reasonable security measures to protect your information, but please note that no Internet transmission is guaranteed to be 100% secure.
privacy.updates_item: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, and the latest version will be posted on this page.
privacy.contact: If you have any questions, please contact us

terms.welcome_message: Welcome to Gar-Type (hereinafter referred to as the Game). Please read this User Agreement carefully before using this game.
terms.user_terms1: You must comply with applicable laws and regulations.
terms.user_terms2: You may not use the Game for any illegal or improper conduct.
terms.user_terms3: All content in the game, including but not limited to images, sounds, and code, is protected by copyright
terms.account_data1: The game may store your game progress and leaderboard data.
terms.account_data2: We are not responsible for losses caused by data loss or game errors.
terms.disclaimer1: The game is provided as is without any warranty of availability, bug free or suitability.
terms.disclaimer2: We are not responsible for service interruption due to force majeure factors (such as server failure, network problems, etc.)
terms.stop_agree1: If you breach this Agreement, we have the right to terminate your rights to use.
terms.update: We may modify this Agreement at any time, and the latest version will be posted on this page.
terms.contact: If you have any questions, please contact us
